abstract: Daisy Rivera testifies at murder trial of former husband Pedro Hernandez, saying he confessed to her that he strangled someone and threw them in a dumpster; prosecutors portray statement as a veiled reference to murder of Etan Patz; Rivera is fifth witness to describe such comments by Hernandez.
lead_paragraph: Daisy Rivera, the former wife of Pedro Hernandez, is one of five witnesses who say he told stories about being a killer in the four years after Etan Patz disappeared in 1979.

headline.main: Ex-Wife of Suspect in Patz Case Testifies That He Confessed to ‘Something Terrible’
headline.print_headline: Ex-Wife of Suspect in Patz Case Testifies That He Confessed to ‘Something Terrible’

snippet: Daisy Rivera, the former wife of Pedro Hernandez, is one of five witnesses who say he told stories about being a killer in the four years after Etan Patz disappeared in 1979.
